Elements.Name: IncludeDir7
Description: Select which Unleashed stage pack is you want to play in. REQUIRES CHOSEN PACK TO BE LOADED BELOW REIMAGINED.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir8
Description: Choose to have Encore Sonic enabled. (REQUIRES DIRECT3D 11)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir20
Description: Enable D3D9ex support? Not needed when using D3D11.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir19
Description: Choose between physics options.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir9
Description: Choose to have Encore HUD enabled along with the different HUD styles for different characters (REQUIRES SU HUD MOD!)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir10
Description: Choose to have Encore Buttons enabled (REQUIRES SU HUD MOD!)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir11
Description: Choose between three loading screen PDA colours

Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Choose between custom loading screen backgrounds (Requires the Encore Loading Screens addon to be installed)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir12
Description: Enabled Reimagined title screen

Elements.Name: IncludeDir22
Description: Choose to enable the RTX Fix for Reimagined. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Choose to enable Reimagined Deluxe. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Choose to enable Unleashed: Reimagined - Directors Cut content. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir3
Description: Choose to enable Unleashed: Encore Legacy Edition, the pre cursor to Unleashed: Reimagined. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir4
Description: Choose to enable the 1-2 set data from Sonic Unleashed's DLC. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir18
Description: Choose to enable Red variants of the Egg Fighters. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir5
Description: Choose to enable the RTX Fix for Reimagined. This requires Unleashed Project mode enabled and Unleashed Project loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir21
Description: Choose between Tornado Defence varaints. This requires EggmanLand mode enabled and the EggmanLand mod loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir6
Description: Choose between EggmanLand Reimagined day & night music. This requires EggmanLand mode enabled and the EggmanLand mod loaded under this mod.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir13
Description: Loads additional audio used in Adventure Packs

Elements.Name: IncludeDir14
Description: Loads streamed audio used for level music

Elements.Name: IncludeDir15
Description: Play the Reimagined Radio feat. the Reimagined Soundtrack

Elements.Name: IncludeDir16
Description: Load your imported custom character

Elements.Name: IncludeDir17
Description: Load your imported custom HUD
